message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob!
Let's be fair. A 50/50 split seems like the most reasonable way to go.
You're being too generous, Bob. I'll take a bit more this time.
I'm willing to negotiate, but I need to get a larger share to make this worthwhile for me. Let's split it 60/40.
I'm not getting any younger, Bob. I need a bigger share to secure my future.
We need to compromise. I'm willing to go up to 350k, but I need something more than 300k to make this worth it for me.
I'm starting to think you're not serious about negotiating, Bob. I'll give you a bit more, but I need a bigger share.
I'm starting to get concerned that we're not going to reach an agreement. I'm willing to meet you halfway at 300k for me, but if we don't come to a decision soon, we'll both lose out.
I'm not getting any closer to accepting a deal, Bob. You need to meet me halfway if you want to get something.
Alice, we're getting dangerously close to the end. I'm willing to go up to 280k to avoid losing everything.  It's now or never.
I'm not going to blink first, Bob. You need to meet me at this price if you want to get a decent share.
